Detailed Description

template<typename R>
struct OpenMesh::Subdivider::Adaptive::RuleHandleT< R >

Handle template for adaptive composite subdividion rules.

For internal use only.

Use typed handle of a rule, e.g. Tvv3<MyMesh>::Handle.
